org.sakaiproject.tool.api

Interface ActiveToolManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ToolManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActiveToolComponent, ActiveToolComponentTest

    public interface ActiveToolManager
extends ToolManager

    Extension API for ToolManager that introduces Servlet API specific activity.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • register

        void register(Tool tool,
            javax.servlet.ServletContext config)
        Add this tool to the registry.
        Parameters:
        tool - The Tool to register.
        config - The ServletContext to be attached to the tool. Only applied to the default implementation, as supplied through the XML signatures (usually via the ToolListener), or a bare Tool instance, which will be decorated. Ignored if supplying a custom ActiveTool implementation (or proxy).

      • register

        void register(Document toolXml,
            javax.servlet.ServletContext config)
        Add tools in this XML DOM to the registry, using the Tool XML schema.
        Parameters:
        toolXml - The parsed XML DOM in which tools to be added to the registry are to be found.

      • register

        void register(File toolXmlFile,
            javax.servlet.ServletContext config)
        Add tools in this file of Tool XML schema to the registry.
        Parameters:
        toolXmlFile - The file of Tool schema XML in which tools to be added to the registry are to be found.

      • register

        void register(InputStream toolXmlStream,
            javax.servlet.ServletContext config)
        Add tools in this stream of Tool XML schema to the registry.
        Parameters:
        toolXmlStream - The file of Tool schema XML in which tools to be added to the registry are to be found.
        config - the Servlet context

      • parseTools

        List<Tool> parseTools(File toolXmlFile)
        Parse a registration file and return a list of Tool Registrations
        Parameters:
        toolXmlFile - The file of Tool schema XML in which tools to be added to the registry are to be found.

      • parseTools

        List<Tool> parseTools(Document toolXml)
        Parse a registration file and return a list of Tool Registrations
        Parameters:
        toolXml - The file of Tool schema XML in which tools to be added to the registry are to be found.

      • parseTools

        List<Tool> parseTools(InputStream toolXmlStream)
        Parse a registration file and return a list of Tool Registrations
        Parameters:
        toolXmlStream - The file of Tool schema XML in which tools to be added to the registry are to be found.

      • getActiveTool

        ActiveTool getActiveTool(String id)
        Find a tool with this well known id in the registry.
        Parameters:
        id - The tool's well known id.
        Returns:
        The Tool object that has this id, or null if not found.

      • getLocalizedToolProperty

        String getLocalizedToolProperty(String toolId,
                              String key)
        Get the localized property of a tool
        Parameters:
        toolId - The fully qualified id of a sakai tool.
        key - The name of the property, for example title or description.
        Returns:
        The tool property, null if tool id is invalid.
